includes.expression: Window.IsActive(musicinformation) | Window.IsActive(songinformation) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Window.IsActive(addoninformation) | Window.IsActive(pvrguideinfo) | Window.IsActive(pvrrecordinginfo) | Window.IsActive(pictureinfo) | Window.IsVisible(script-script.extendedinfo-DialogVideoInfo.xml) | Window.IsVisible(script-script.extendedinfo-DialogInfo.xml)

control.visible: ![[String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HideBars.label),$LOCALIZE[40069])] + [Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(507) | [Control.IsVisible(55) + !Window.IsVisible(AddonBrowser) + !Container.Content(actors) + !Container.Content(directors)+ !Container.Content(files)] | Control.IsVisible(505) | Control.IsVisible(501) | Control.IsVisible(502) | Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(51) | Control.IsVisible(53) | Control.IsVisible(54)]]

control.description: button overlay to avoid closing in dialog area

animation.condition: [String.IsEqual(Skin.String(HideBars.label),$LOCALIZE[40069]) + [Window.IsVisible(MyVideoNav.xml) | Window.IsVisible(MyMusicNav.xml)] + !Container.Content(addons) + [Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(507) | Control.IsVisible(505) | Control.IsVisible(501) | Control.IsVisible(502) | Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(51) | Control.IsVisible(53) | Control.IsVisible(54) | [Control.IsVisible(55) + !Container.Content(actors) + !Container.Content(directors) + ![Control.IsVisible(55) + Window.IsVisible(MyVideoNav.xml)]] | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(58) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(503)]]
